Class LocationMarkerOverlay

java.lang.Object
  Overlay
      de.bolz.android.taglocate.ui.LocationMarkerOverlay

public class LocationMarkerOverlay
extends Overlay

This class is responsible for drawing a location marker on the Map View.

Author:
Johannes Bolz
